DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate acute effect low high glycemic index breakfast glycemic response satiety subject type 2 diabetes mellitus intensive insulin therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Glycemic Index Subjects With Diabetes Mellitus Insulin Requesting
DOC.criteria: Subjects type 2 diabetes mellitus diagnosis . Minimum period six month intensive insulin therapy . Fast insulin prescription breakfast . 35 70 year age . BMI 25 39.9 Kg/m2 . HbA1c le equal 10 % ( 86mmol/mol ) Menopausal woman hormone replacement therapy Pregnant woman . Puerperal woman . Subjects neurological disease , endocrine disorder treatment , kidney disease stage IV V , cancer , liver disease , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , human immunodeficiency virus . Subjects history stroke , acute myocardial infarction gastrointestinal resection .
